title: Token
body:
Just out of curiosity how many worlds tokens does everyone have? 

I want to be able to purchase the Kai Sa Prestige Edition skin when its available but It's apparently going to cost 2500 tokens !! I'm only sitting on 415 tokens atm. 

Even buying a bunch of bundles is going to cost wayyyyyy to much money but I really want to be able to purchase the skin :(

replies.body:
one account has 1300 

this account has about 600
how did you get to 1300? did you spend RP on bundles??
correct. worlds pass and khaz dire wolves bundle
I am about 1000 ish... but not interested in prestige kai sa, the colour annoys me
You are very lucky to be on 1000 looks like im just gonna have to buy and spend rp
